englishAnimeSites.editorNotes: Huge library. Can find older and rare shows.
Japanese subtitles are available.  Viewers can toggle subtitles as per their wish. Anyone wishing to learn Japanese from watching anime can use this site.
Clone site of AnimeDao.to created by the owner of GenoAnime.

foreignAnimeSites.editorNotes: Main site for Arabic sub uploads

englishMangaSites.editorNotes: Not affiliated with the original bato.to

englishMangaSites.otherLanguages: ES, BR, RU, DE, IT, FR

visualNovels.editorNotes: Offers highly compressed repacks of games that are smaller-sized but may take several hours to install.
Files are offered in 200 MB parts in the free download option.
Dump of torrents from the site Fuwanovel, which was shut down.
There are ads on the link shorteners. Main site has no ads.

browserExtensions.siteFeatures: Sync your anime list from various streaming sites & programs asap

hentaiAnime.editorNotes: Possibly unrelated to KissAnime and KissManga, as it didn't go down then.

hentaiDoujinshi.editorNotes: Requires login to download | Has torrents.

hentaiDownload.editorNotes: Also has RPGs, VNs and Adult games.

hentaiApplications.editorNotes: A fork of the popular manga app Tachiyomi focusing on NSFW content.
